contents:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The order of the Commonwealth Court, 28 Pa.Cmwlth. 520, 368 A.2d 1328, is vacated and the case remanded to that court for consideration in light of Commonwealth v. Molycorp, Inc., 481 Pa. 208, 392 A.2d 321 (1978).
LARSEN, J., dissents and would reach the merits.
